Package com.imperial_net.inventioryApp.dashboard.service

Class DashboarService

java.lang.Object
com.imperial_net.inventioryApp.dashboard.service.DashboarService
@Service public class DashboarService extends Object
Servicio para obtener datos y estadísticas del panel de control.
